## Usage

These base images are used to generate test fixtures for CLIP-based duplicate detection.
Each base image is transformed (resized, recompressed) to create duplicate variants
that Immich's ML system will recognize as semantically similar.

## Source

All images downloaded December 2025 from:
https://images.unsplash.com/photo-{ID}?w=3000&q=85
